thread.title: Bayer to win EU approval for $62.5 bln Monsanto deal - sources

title: Bayer to win EU approval for $62.5 bln Monsanto deal - sources
text:
Bayer to win EU approval for $62.5 bln Monsanto deal - sources 12:15am IST - 01:05 
German drug and crop chemicals maker Bayer is set to win conditional European Union antitrust approval for its $62.5 billion bid for world No. 1 seed company Monsanto, sources told Reuters. Aleksandra Michalska reports.   
German drug and crop chemicals maker Bayer is set to win conditional European Union antitrust approval for its $62.5 billion bid for world No. 1 seed company Monsanto, sources told Reuters. Aleksandra Michalska reports.  //reut.rs/2GTKLmi
